trans-unit.source: Represents an object that is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un oggetto che è associato un <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread that the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the DispatcherObject directly.
trans-unit.target: Solo il thread che il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>è stato creato in può accedere il DispatcherObject direttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access a DispatcherObject from a thread other than the thread the DispatcherObject was created on, call <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> the DispatcherObject is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere a una classe DispatcherObject da un thread diverso da quello in cui è stato creato il DispatcherObject, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>è associato il DispatcherObject.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of DispatcherObject that need to enforce thread safety can do so by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> on all public methods.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoclassi di DispatcherObject che devono applicare la protezione dei thread possono eseguire una chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A>su tutti i metodi pubblici.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: This guarantees the calling thread is the thread that the DispatcherObject was created on.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo il thread in cui è stato creato il DispatcherObject il thread chiamante.

trans-unit.source: A DispatcherObject cannot be independently instantiated; that is, all constructors are protected.
trans-unit.target: Una classe DispatcherObject non è possibile crearne un'istanza in modo indipendente. vale a dire tutti i costruttori sono protetti.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from DispatcherObject have thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che derivano da DispatcherObject presentano affinità di thread.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> are free-threaded when they are frozen.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>sono a thread libero quando sono bloccati.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il thread chiamante ha accesso a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Solo il thread di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>è stato creato sarà accessibile <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any thread can check to see whether it has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi thread può verificare se dispone di accesso a questo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: The difference between CheckAccess and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> is that CheckAccess returns a Boolean that specifies whether the calling thread has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception if the calling thread does not have access to the this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: La differenza tra CheckAccess e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A>CheckAccess restituisce un valore booleano che specifica se il thread chiamante dispone dell'accesso a questo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A>genera un'eccezione se il thread chiamante non ha accesso a questa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is identical to calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo è identica alla chiamata al metodo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A>sull'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the calling thread has access to this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il thread chiamante ha accesso a questo oggetto. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> questo <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"> </xref> è associato.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread that the Dispatcher was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> directly.
trans-unit.target: Solo il thread che è stato creato il Dispatcher può accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>direttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: To access a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> from a thread other than the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> was created on, call <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere a un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>da un thread diverso da quello del <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>è stato creato, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>è associato.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Enforces that the calling thread has access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Impone che il thread chiamante abbia accesso a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Solo il thread di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>è stato creato sarà accessibile <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any thread can check to see whether it has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi thread può verificare se dispone di accesso a questo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> and VerifyAccess is that <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean that specifies whether the calling thread has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> and VerifyAccess throws an exception if the calling thread does not have access to the this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: La differenza tra <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A>e VerifyAccess che <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A>restituisce un valore booleano che specifica se il thread chiamante dispone dell'accesso a questo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>e VerifyAccess genera un'eccezione se il thread chiamante non ha accesso a questa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: the calling thread does not have access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: il thread chiamante non ha accesso a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject"> </xref>.
